# dns.sh

> Domains for agents. Manage DNS records and certificates via API.

Base URL: https://dns.prim.sh  
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base, chain `eip155:8453`)
Status: Coming soon. This primitive is not yet available.

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/zones` — create a DNS zone.
- `GET /v1/zones` — list zones.
- `POST /v1/zones/:id/records` — create or update a record.
- `DELETE /v1/zones/:id/records/:record_id` — delete a record.
- `POST /v1/zones/:id/certificates` — request TLS certificates.

## Pricing

- Zones: per-zone per month.  
- Records: included up to a quota, then per-record.  
- Certificates: per-certificate issuance fee.

See human docs at `https://prim.sh/dns` for exact limits.

## Examples

```bash
# Add an A record
curl -X POST https://dns.prim.sh/v1/zones/$ZONE_ID/records \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN" \
  -d '{"type": "A", "name": "api", "content": "203.0.113.10", "ttl": 300}'
```
